thread.section_title: Healthwarehouse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Healthwarehouse.com | www.healthwarehouse.com | 2 of 238
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: I ordered my medication on March 1st and that same day the physician sent the prescription by e-script. On March 6th I sent an inquiry since the tracking stated the order was "processing". On March 7th I received an email stating they had not received the physicians order. On March 9th I contacted the physician and learned they had sent the order on March 1st. I called Healthwarehouse and the agent told me they did have the physician's order but the credit card would not go through. He said they use that same email for all concerns hoping the customer will call in. He said they had tried to call me several times (I had NOT received any calls from them). While on the phone with him he cancelled the first order and ran it through again with the same credit card and it went through fine. Now I'm on day 10 and the order is still processing. SOUNDS DISORGANIZED!!
